faq.a: SearXNG is a free and open-source metasearch engine that aggregates results from multiple search engines without tracking users or building user profiles.
SearXNG doesn't track users, store search queries, or build user profiles. It acts as a proxy between you and other search engines, keeping your searches anonymous.

faq.q: What search engines does it use?
faq.a: SearXNG aggregates results from 70+ search engines including Google, Bing, DuckDuckGo, Wikipedia, Reddit, and many others.

faq.q: Can I make my IP address anonymous?
faq.a: Yes, you can configure SearXNG to use a proxy server so that requests to other search engines are made via the proxy rather than your actual IP address.
